node.title: Blaze forces closure of campgrounds, wineries and tourist attractions in Margaret River region
node.alt: A bushfire at night, framed by trees, with a firetruck in the frame.
node.description: Campgrounds, wineries and caves are evacuated as a bushfire threatens lives and homes around the Boranup Forest near Margaret River in WA's South West.
node.content:
["Several campgrounds, wineries\u00a0and tourist attractions have been evacuated as a\u00a0bushfire threatens\u00a0lives and homes around\u00a0the Boranup Forest near Margaret River in Western Australia's South West.", "The Department of Fire and Emergency Services (DFES) has issued\u00a0an emergency bushfire warning for Leeuwin- Naturaliste National Park, with nearby residents urged to evacuate.\u00a0\u00a0", "The warning is in place for people south of Redgate Road, west of the park boundary,\u00a0south to Sebbes Road and north of Point Road.\u00a0", "Redgate Beach as well as several caves, which are popular with tourists, have been closed including Mammoth, Lake, Giants and Calgardup.", "Local campgrounds have also been evacuated, including Conto and Point Road campsites.", "WA Parks and Wildlife district fire coordinator Ed Hatherley said\u00a0more than 100 firefighters were tackling the blaze in the hope\u00a0of getting it contained overnight.", "\"It's certainly aggressive fire behaviour,\" he said.", "\u201cThe water bomber drops are trying to help limit that fire spread so we can get in and contain it tonight.\u201d", "While the weather was\u00a0helping efforts to contain the blaze, firefighters were battling difficult terrain.", "\"(It is) very difficult for suppression because of the underground caves, so we can't use traditional fire suppression techniques,\" he said.", "\"We're using heavy plant machines to cut fire breaks so we're having to rely on aircraft to help suppress it.\"", "The fire remains out of control and escalating in heavy fuel loads after a wet winter.\u00a0", "", "
Candice Vooles\u00a0saw the fire come\u00a0within 100 metres of the winery she was working at.(Supplied: Candice Vooles)
", "Candice Vooles recalled hearing sirens and seeing the fire come within 100 metres of the winery she was working at this morning.\u00a0", "\"[It was]\u00a0really, really high, really black and it looked like it was really kicking up\u2026 and there were two planes flying overhead,\" she said.", "The fire started near the intersection of Caves and Calgardup roads in Boranup.", "", "
A roadblock on the corner of Redgate and Caves Roads, while Bussell Highway remains open.\u00a0(ABC News: Anthony Pancia.)
", "Several roads have been closed including Boranup Drive and Caves Road from Redgate Road to Forest Grove Road.", "People can still leave the area via Bussell Highway and can seek refuge at the Margaret River Recreation Centre.", "", "
The fire forced the closure of wineries in the Margaret River region.(ABC News)
", "Ben Tannock, from the Department of Biodiversity, Conservation and Attractions, said the fire was burning on\u00a0both sides of Caves Road, near tourist attractions in the national park.", "\"The fire is burning both sides of Caves Road north of Mammoth Cave and north of Lake Cave,\" he said.\u00a0", "\"It's in an area known for its cast formations and is a problematic area for us... in terms of putting in machinery to create containment lines.\"", "A bushfire watch and act warning is also in place for Redgate in the Shire of Augusta Margaret River for people in an area\u00a0bounded by Redgate Road to the north, Harrison road to the east and Forest Grove Road to the South."]
